articles.description: Ange Postecoglou's sacking shows the old Spurs saying "the game is about glory" does not count under chairman Daniel Levy, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Tottenham: Ange Postecoglou sack shows glory is not what matters to Daniel Levy

articles.description: An in-depth look at why Tottenham sacked Ange Postecoglou 16 days after their Europa League success.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou sacked: Why Tottenham parted with Australian after Europa League triumph.

articles.description: Novak Djokovic gave an emotional goodbye to the French Open crowd after his semi-final defeat by Jannik Sinner. Will he return to Roland Garros?
articles.title: French Open 2025: Novak Djokovic bids emotional farewell to Roland Garros crowd - but will he be back?

articles.description: Liam Dawson may not have the height or variations England crave, but the left-arm spinner may be exactly what they need, writes Matt Henry.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Liam Dawson shows hosts what they had been missing

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Norway vs Italy in the UEFA World Cup Qualifiers
articles.title: Norway vs Italy: UEFA World Cup Qualifiers stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Thomas Tuchel says fans need to be patient with England and not "over expect" when they play Andorra, the 173rd-ranked team in world football, on Saturday.
articles.title: Thomas Tuchel says England fans must be patient and not "over expect" against Andorra

articles.description: Former England captain David Beckham is set to be awarded a knighthood in King Charles' birthday honours.

articles.description: Italy midfielder Jorginho joins Brazilian club Flamengo following his early departure from Arsenal.
articles.title: Jorginho joins Flamengo after Arsenal departure

articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Carlos Alcaraz through to men's final after Lorenzo Musetti retires injured

articles.description: Rory McIlroy cards a woeful eight-over-par 78 as he misses the cut at the Canadian Open.
